full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BKA' SDOD GING CHEN MA RTZI LA BSANG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A*, ,(CES SKYES BU DAM CAN RDO RJE @003B LEGS PA'I BKA' SDOD GSHIN RJE GING CHEN MA RU RTZE LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GZHAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN PA BYUNG DAM SNYAM PA'I LHAG BSAM BZANG PO PAS DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG PUN KHA BRTEN NAS BRIS 'DI LA 'GAL 'KHRUL CI MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA YI DAM PADMA DBANG CHEN BKA' SDOD DANG BCAS PA RNAMS LA BZOD PAR GSOL ZHING 'CHAGS SO, ,BDAG CAG LA SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU SKAD CIG KYANG GA-YEL BA MED PAR STONGS GROGS MDZAD DU GSOL, ,SHU BHAm MAR'U SATVA JE GAST'Am, ,)
